text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump When Bunker Don is kicked out on his ass the United States will prosper. There are now 2,100,000 Covid-19 Cases and 117,000 American Deaths; and a trashed economy with 44,000,000 Americans out of work. When are you and your DO NOTHING REPUBLICANS going to do the right thing?
